nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets contract state to provided value and returns it. The
     invocation is restricted to the contract owner. Also, a
     `Bit` event is emitted.

      * @param _bit Bit value to set to.
nodes.name: setBit

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (struct BitLibrary.Data storage pointer) view returns (bool)

nodes.documentation: @dev Event emitted on contract state changes.
nodes.name: Bit
